speaker: customer
text: Hi, I need to update my address. I've recently moved.

speaker: agent
text: Hello Sarah! I'd be happy to help you update your address. Let me pull up your account.

speaker: customer
text: Thank you. My new address is 128 Oak Avenue, Springfield, IL 62704.

speaker: agent
text: Perfect. I'm updating that now. Can you also verify your date of birth for security purposes?

speaker: agent
text: Thank you for confirming. I've updated your address in our system.

speaker: customer
text: Great! While I have you, I also wanted to ask about a recent transaction.

speaker: agent
text: Of course. Which transaction are you referring to?

speaker: customer
text: There's a charge from TechStore for $459.99. I don't recognize it.

speaker: agent
text: Let me look into that for you. I see the transaction from November 24th. Would you like to dispute this charge?

speaker: customer
text: Yes, please. I definitely didn't make that purchase.

speaker: agent
text: I understand. I'm initiating a dispute for transaction TXN-001. You should see a provisional credit within 3-5 business days.

speaker: customer
text: Thank you so much for your help!

speaker: agent
text: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with today?

speaker: customer
text: No, that's everything. Have a great day!
